related_post.text: Maybe I should make my question clearer: interpereting the int64 as a string first and then it becomes base64 is not the way I'd like to go. For example the number 56710363101528064 with a mathematical base of 64 is AADAV8Z5yQA but if it is base64 encoded it becomes NTY3MTAzNjMxMDE1MjgwNjQg
